actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating segments of certain rivers in the State of Colorado for study as potential components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers system.

summary.text: Colorado Rivers Preservation Act - Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, specified segments of rivers in the State of Colorado for study as potential components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Authorizes appropriations of $2,250,000 to carry out the purposes of this Act. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1274(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating segments of certain rivers in the State of Colorado for study as potential components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers system.
